title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - Iceland - Hallgrimskirja Church

In this video we will fly over the HallgrÃ­mskirkja . HallgrÃ­mskirkja is a Lutheran (Church of Iceland) parish church in ReykjavÃ­k, Iceland. At 74.5 metres (244 ft) tall, it is the largest church in Iceland and among the tallest structures in the country. Known for its distinctively curved spire and side wings, it has been described as having become an important symbol for Iceland's national identity since its completion in 1986[2] The church is named after the Icelandic poet and cleric HallgrÃ­mur PÃ©tursson (1614â€“1674), author of the Passion Hymns.
